Parameters: int: These bits will be cleared in the paint's flags
int: These bits will be set in the paint's flags
PaintFlagsDrawFilter(int,int).Description: Subclass of DrawFilter that affects every paint by first clearing the specified clearBits in the paint's flags, and then setting the specified setBits in the paint's flags.

Parameters: int: These bits will be cleared in the paint's flags
int: These bits will be set in the paint's flags
PaintFlagsDrawFilter(int, int).Description: Subclass of DrawFilter that affects every paint by first clearing the specified clearBits in the paint's flags, and then setting the specified setBits in the paint's flags.
